title: Steve Cochran and Kim Geiger: Why Chicago might not be ready for the socialism question
description: Bernie Sanders sticks to his playbook with a speech explaining what he means by "democratic socialism" and President Trump trades barbs with former Vice President Joe Biden. Chuck is in Chicago today to talk with Steve Cochran from WGN Radio and Kim Geiger from the Chicago Tribune.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
